summary: Two high school students become stranded on a tropical island and must rely on each other for survival. They learn more about themselves and each other while falling in love.
cast: Indiana Evans|Brenton Thwaites|Denise Richards|Patrick St. Esprit|Frank John Hughes|Alix Elizabeth Gitter|Carrie Wampler|Hayley Kiyoko|Aimee Carrero|Annie Tedesco|Christopher Atkins|Jacob Artist|Marcus Giamatti|Brendan Calton|Rick Chambers|Christine Clayburg|Danielle Demski|James Moses Black|Sharon Ferguson|Eric Bivens-Bush|James Jolly|Mark Mullaney Jr.|Sarah Baldwin|Jeffrey Larson|Emeka Amene|Shanice Archer|Schezaad Ausman|Kathleen Bade|Brittney Bomann|William Brush|Jamie Dorn|Arian Khoroushi|Gabriel Knight|Kyle Leatherberry|Alexis Verbeck|Ashley Zhang
title: El lago azul: El despertar
